sentence.Network_en: We gave the gate money to the St John Ambulance brigade.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们将门票收入都捐给了圣约翰急救队。

sentence.Network_en: A third brigade is at sea, ready for an amphibious assault.
sentence.Network_cn: 还有一个旅已在海上待命，准备两栖进攻。

sentence.Network_en: The fire brigade should always be called out to a house fire.
sentence.Network_cn: 一旦房屋失火，就应该马上叫消防队来。

... 土地征收征用制度 system for land expropriation and requisition 突击队 shock brigade 吐苦水 pour out one's grievance.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French, from Italian brigata company, from brigare contend, from briga 'strife'

entry.def: A brigade is one of the groups which an army is divided into.

example.ex: ...the men of the Seventh Armoured Brigade.

entry.tran: （信奉某事或具有共同特点的）一帮人，族
entry.def: You can use brigade to refer to a group of people who believe strongly in a particular thing or who share a particular characteristic.

means.word_mean: 1. army unit smaller than a division
1. form or unite into a brigade

auth_sentence.content: Both, he said, including my own brigade.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both, he said, including my own brigade.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both, he said, including my own brigade.

auth_sentence.content: Traders say the fire brigade was slow to respond.
auth_sentence.res_content: Traders say the fire brigade was slow to respond.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Traders say the fire brigade was slow to respond.

auth_sentence.content: The Caribbean is a magnet for the celeb-on-a-jet-ski brigade.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Caribbean is a magnet for the celeb-on-a-jet-ski brigade.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Caribbean is a magnet for the celeb-on-a-jet-ski brigade.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,表示"状态,物品"; 2. "个人或集体"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 拱廊;[一侧或两侧有商店的]通道
stems_affixes.word_buile: arc弓+ade表名词→n.拱廊;[一侧或两侧有商店的]通道

stems_affixes.value_cn: [军队]旅;[担任特殊任务的]团、队
stems_affixes.word_buile: brig战斗+ade集体→n.[军队]旅;[担任特殊任务的]团、队
cannon大炮+ade状态,物品→n.连续开炮,炮击
caval马+c+ade表示集体→n.骑兵队,队伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 为维护理想,原则而进行的运动或斗争
stems_affixes.word_buile: crus十字形+ade集体→指中世纪十字军,佩戴十字符号,引申为改革运动
lemon柠檬+ade状态,物品→n.柠檬汽水
re反+neg否认+ade表示集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
barr栏+ic+ade表名词→n.&v.设栅阻挡,栅栏

sentences.en: They fought in the same brigade during the war.
sentences.cn: 战争中, 他们在同一旅作战。

jushi.english: They allowed each member of the brigade one cotton-padded suit.
jushi.chinese: 他们发给这个旅每个成员一套棉衣。
